Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile to prior rounds.

answers.answer:
EIPs Insight Recap: 2024 Milestones details most of the tooling & metrics - https://eipsinsight.com/milestones2024

EIPs Insight is a data-driven platform dedicated to improving transparency, accountability, and efficiency in Ethereum’s core governance and development processes. It significantly strengthens the Ethereum network’s infrastructure by equipping contributors, developers, editors, and the broader community with purpose-built tools that streamline the lifecycle of Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) and foster high-quality collaboration across the ecosystem.

Metrics & Outcomes
•	950+ EIPs tracked, with up-to-date metadata and review timelines
•	Real-time dashboards across GitHub repos, with automated updates
•	Editor analytics actively used by stakeholders for transparency and performance tracking
•	Pectra upgrade tracking adopted by contributors for coordination and visibility
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer:
Recently, we introduced new tools to further enhance the platform. The [EIP Proposal Builder](https://eipsinsight.com/proposalbuilder#split#eip#new) helps users draft new proposals by guiding them through the required format and structure. The Block Countdown Tool, available on the [Pectra page](https://eipsinsight.com/pectra), tracks the number of blocks remaining until the Ethereum network transitions to the Pectra upgrade. Additionally, the Network Upgrades and EIPs Relationship Graph (can be found in the Pectra page) visually represents how Pectra-related EIPs connect to past network upgrades.
Well received by the [community]( https://x.com/JBSchweitzer/status/1897327401727877130 )
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer:
EIPsInsight addresses inefficiencies in tracking Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs), which were previously managed manually by Ethereum Cat Herders. The lack of automation resulted in delays, outdated records, and limited access to historical data, making governance processes less transparent and efficient.
By automating data collection, EIPsInsight eliminates human error, ensuring real-time tracking of EIP status changes. The platform consolidates historical governance data, enabling users to analyze trends and make informed decisions. Its interactive visualizations, categorized proposal views, and downloadable reports simplify complex governance data, making it more accessible to developers, editors, and the community.
EIPsInsight enhances Ethereum governance by offering dynamic tools like the EIP Board for tracking pull requests, the Proposal Builder for documenting EIPs, and the Network Upgrades Relationships Chart for mapping dependencies. These features ensure a structured, data-driven governance process, aligning with Ethereum’s core values of transparency and decentralization​.
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer:
EIPsInsight follows a structured roadmap to improve Ethereum governance tracking. In early 2025, key features like the EIP Board, Proposal Builder, and Target Block Countdown Tool were launched, enhancing proposal management and accessibility.
Q1 2025 focuses on UX audits, accessibility improvements, and tool development, including a Network Upgrades Relationships Chart for tracking EIP dependencies and an EIP Discussion Bot for governance discussions. Q2 2025 will implement UI/UX enhancements, introduce new platform features, and expand the RIPs page with educational content while increasing community engagement through webinars and workshops.
Q3-Q4 2025 aims to introduce AI-powered EIP tracking tools, multi-language support, and customizable smart alerts for real-time governance updates. The funding supports UX improvements, feature enhancements, and community outreach to ensure Ethereum’s governance process remains efficient, decentralized, and accessible.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer:
EIPsInsight reinforces decentralization by making Ethereum governance open-source, transparent, and automated. Previously, EIP tracking relied on manual updates, which were prone to errors and inefficiencies. By automating proposal tracking, the platform removes centralized control over governance data, allowing contributors and developers to access reliable information in real-time.
Security is enhanced through improved proposal tracking and verification. The platform ensures that EIPs follow a rigorous approval process, reducing risks associated with unclear or outdated proposals. The historical tracking of governance changes also enables stakeholders to analyze past security challenges, ensuring informed decision-making for future protocol upgrades.
By introducing AI-driven insights and expanding Ethereum governance tracking beyond its ecosystem, EIPsInsight fosters global participation and cross-chain integrations. These innovations make Ethereum’s governance more robust, scalable, and secure, ensuring its long-term sustainability​.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: EIPsInsight
project.description:
[EIPsInsight](https://eipsinsight.com) is specialized in toolings designed to provide clear, visual insights into the activity of [Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs)](https://youtu.be/AyidVR6X6J8), [Ethereum Request for Comments (ERCs)](https://youtu.be/fwxkbUaa92w), and Rollup Improvement Proposals (RIPs). Our website offers a detailed view of the status changes, visualizations, and downloadable reports for these proposals, supporting the Ethereum ecosystem by aiding developers and editors in navigating and understanding the intricacies of improvement proposals. 

This tooling website improves transparency and efficiency in decision-making. By offering useful tools  - [Reviewers Tracker](https://eipsinsight.com/Reviewers) & [GitHub](https://eipsinsight.com/Analytics) , EIPsInsight supports developers, EIP editors, and other stakeholders, contributing to a decentralized Governance, building a stronger and more sustainable Ethereum ecosystem.

EIPsInsight is already gaining notable community attention and participation. A recent example is a small but impactful fix contributed by a popular [blockchain contributor](https://github.com/AvarchLLC/EIPsInsight/pull/54), highlighting the growing interest and involvement. Additionally, we are actively working on improving the tool based on [valuable feedback](https://github.com/AvarchLLC/EIPsInsight/issues/55) and [feature request](https://github.com/AvarchLLC/EIPsInsight/issues/56) from [EIP editor Sam Wilson](@_SamWilsn_). We invite the community to explore the various toolings, share suggestions by creating [Issues](https://github.com/AvarchLLC/EIPsInsight/issues), or contribute directly by submitting [PRs](https://github.com/AvarchLLC/EIPsInsight/pulls) with solutions. Your participation is key to further enhancing EIPsInsight!
